price: 10. »y les dije: “Pedid perdón a vuestro Señor, Él es Sumamente Indulgente.
arabic: فَقُلۡتُ ٱسۡتَغۡفِرُواْ رَبَّكُمۡ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ غَفَّارٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: faqul'tu is'taghfirū rabbakum innahu kāna ghaffāran
